dict.acceptation: 相等的，相当的，等效的；等价的，等积的；[化学]当量的；

sent.orig: He changed his pounds for the equivalent an equivalent amount of dollars.
sent.trans: 他把他的英镑换成等值的美元。

sent.orig: Instances of the same row type are equivalent if the members are respectively equivalent.
sent.trans: 如果同一行类型的实例的成员分别等效，则这些实例是等效的。

sent.orig: The equivalent enthalpy drop method(EEDM)is equivalent to the habitual thermal balance method(HTBM) on the thermodynamic principle.
sent.trans: 分析证明了常规热平衡法、等效焓降法整体算法和等效焓降法局部简化算法的一致性。

sent.orig: Firstly, we obtain the equivalent-single-user capacity bound of MUD-RAS system by means of the equivalent-single-user analysis.
sent.trans: 本文研究了多用户分集和接收天线选择联合系统的容量。

sent.orig: On the Internet, the traffic equivalent to the strength, and strength equivalent to the money.
sent.trans: 在互联网上，访问量等同于实力，而实力等同于金钱。
